name: saucedemo-automation
description: Automated test suite for Sauce Labs demo website

scripts.verify-env: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const missing = ['TEST_USERNAME', 'TEST_PASSWORD', 'CHECKOUT_FIRST_NAME', 'CHECKOUT_LAST_NAME', 'CHECKOUT_POSTAL_CODE'].filter(key => !process.env[key]); if (missing.length) { console.error('Missing required environment variables:', missing.join(', ')); console.error('Please create a .env file from .env.example'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log(' All required environment variables are set'); }"
